DC CODE ยง 5-563.01

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: No existing special salary rates shall be authorized for members of the United States Park Police under section 5305 of title 5, United States Code (or any previous similar provision of law); and
No special rates of pay or special pay adjustments shall be applicable to members of the United States Park Police pursuant to section 405 of the Federal Law Enforcement Pay Reform Act of 1990.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Termination of existing special salary rates and adjustments.
